description: Vector embeddings for Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics book chapters

section_title.description: Section or subsection title within the chapter

url_path.description: Relative URL path to the chapter section (e.g., '/docs/modules/ros2/fundamentals#topics')

chunk_text.description: The actual text content of the chunk (500-1000 tokens)

chunk_index.description: Sequential index of chunk within the chapter

token_count.description: Number of tokens in the chunk

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the embedding was created
